projects.title: Soul Source
projects.summary: Soul Source is a React web app that allows users to find and save Black and POC resources and events related to gaming and tech. Users can sign in with social media and organize their favorite resources too!

projects.title: Jammify
projects.summary: Jammify! is a small React web app that allows users to create playlists, name them, and add them to their Spotify accounts using the Spotify API. It's responsive for mobile devices too!

projects.title: B Hive
projects.summary: B Hive is a web app developed for BRIC, a non-profit organization, which allows users to upload their video content to their website from anywhere and any device. This automated and sped up their proceses, allowing them to grow their brand, reach more users, and get more content on their site.

projects.title: Code Control
projects.summary: Code Control is an educational coding game meant to help intro CS students hone their coding ability. The game has been successful and has been expanded upon by future generations of students dedicated to making coding more fun and engaging to learn.

projects.title: Path of the Gamer
projects.summary: Path of the Gamer is a small and simple educational wedsite about the game design process. Meant to give some insight to those who want to learn more about what it takes to make a small to medium scale video game.
